import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import {BrowserRouter as Router, Switch , Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PostsTeasers from './components/PostsTeasers' import FullPost from './components/FullPost' import PostForm from './components/PostForm' import { api_getCategories } from './API-calls' import { GET_CATEGORIES } from './actions' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' export default function App() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { getCategories() }, []) const getCategories = async () => { const categories = await api_getCategories() dispatch({type: GET_CATEGORIES, categories }) } return (
go back
) }
